author: Minecraft
description:
Time for another Minecraft Monthly episode, and Vu has fully embraced the role of ring (and mayhem) announcer! Perhaps he’s even gone a bit overboard, if you ask Agnes Larsson and her eardrums. Hopefully, he’ll calm down and tell you more about everything from boxing, AI, lots of Mounts of Mayhem features, and so much more:

00:00 – 01:04 – Intro and mayhem time!
01:05 – 01:35 – What’s up with Camel Husks found in Mounts of Mayhem?
01:36 – 01:59 – Oh look, it’s pointy, sharp, and fast – the Spear!
02:00 – 02:37 – Dive right in and learn more about the Nautilus.
02:38 – 03:05 – Back to the ring and the epic fight!
03:06 – 03:24 – Something upside-down coming to Minecraft.
03:25 – 03:53 – How to be best buds with AI in Minecraft Education.
03:54 – 04:10 – Zombie Horses are on the loose (and how to ride them)!
04:11 – 04:21 – Traverse water by horse with our nifty mount improvement!
04:30 – 04:41 – A real sturdy and cool Netherite Horse Armor.
04:42 – 05:40 – K.O. time and Mounts of Mayh
title: LATEST GAME DROP DATE REVEAL! | MINECRAFT MONTHLY
